verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Strong <S%G2478><s%> Coming Down <S%G2597><s%> Out <S%G1537><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Clothed With <S%G4016><s%> A Cloud, <S%G3507><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Rainbow <S%G2463><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Head, <S%G2776><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4383><s%> His Face <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun, <S%G2246><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> His Feet <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Pillars <S%G4769><s%> Of Fire, <S%G4442><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Cried <S%G2896><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> A Lion <S%G3023><s%> Roars. <S%G3455><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> He Cried, <S%G2896><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Thunders <S%G1027><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1438><s%> Their Voices. <S%G5456><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Thunders <S%G1027><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5456><s%> , Their Voices, <S%G1438><s%> I Was About <S%G3195><s%> To Write : <S%G1125><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Out <S%G1537><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> , To Me, <S%G3427><s%> Seal <S%G4972><s%> What Things <S%G3739><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Thunders, <S%G1027><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Them <S%G5023><s%> Write. <S%G1125><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Lifted Up <S%G142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> His Hand <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Sware <S%G3660><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Lives <S%G2198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages, <S%G165><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Created <S%G2936><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> It, <S%G3754><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Shall <S%G2071><s%> Be Longer; <S%G2089><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Seventh <S%G1442><s%> Angel, <S%G32><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> He Is About <S%G3195><s%> To Sound The Trumpet, <S%G4537><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Should Be Completed <S%G5055><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mystery <S%G3466><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> He Did Announce The Glad Tidings To <S%G2097><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1438><s%> His Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets. <S%G4396><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven Was <S%G3772><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Speaking <S%G2980><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me, <S%G1700><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Go, <S%G5217><s%> Take <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Book <S%G974><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Is Open <S%G455><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> Of The Angel <S%G32><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Standing <S%G2476><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Went <S%G565><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel, <S%G32><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> , To Him, <S%G846><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Book. <S%G974><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Me, <S%G3427><s%> Take <S%G2983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Eat Up <S%G2719><s%> It : <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Shall Make Bitter <S%G4087><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Belly, <S%G2836><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> Thy Mouth <S%G4675><s%> It Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Sweet <S%G1099><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Honey. <S%G3192><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Took <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Book <S%G974><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Angel, <S%G32><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ate Up <S%G2719><s%> It; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Was <S%G2258><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> My Mouth <S%G3450><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Honey <S%G3192><s%> Sweet; <S%G1099><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> I Did Eat <S%G5315><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> Was Made Bitter <S%G4087><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2836><s%> My Belly. <S%G3450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Me, <S%G3427><s%> Thou <S%G1163><s%> Must <S%G4571><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Prophecy <S%G4395><s%> As To <S%G1909><s%> Peoples, <S%G2992><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Nations, <S%G1484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Tongues, <S%G1100><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> Many. <S%G4183><s%>
